ERR10000.description: Incorrect signature or malformed token in authorization header

ERR10001.description: Jwt token in authorization header expired

ERR10002.description: No Authorization header or the token is not bearer type

ERR10003.description: Incorrect signature or malformed token in X-Scope-Token header

ERR10005.description: Scopes in authorization token and spec scopes are not matched

ERR10006.description: Scopes in scope token and spec scopes are not matched

ERR10007.description: Request path cannot be found in the spec.

ERR10008.description: Request method cannot be found in the spec.

ERR10009.description: Could not get client credentials token in client module

ERR10012.description: SwaggerHandler or JwtVerifyHandler needs to be enabled

ERR10013.description: Server info handler is disabled in info.json

ERR11000.description: Query parameter '%s' is required on path '%s' but not found in request.

ERR11001.description: Parameter '%s' is required but is missing.

ERR11002.description: Value '%s' for parameter '%s' is not allowed. Allowed values are <%s>.

ERR11005.description: Parameter '%s' expected collection format of '%s' but '%s' was used instead.

ERR11006.description: Parameter '%s' accepts a maximum of %d items. Found %d.

ERR11007.description: Parameter '%s' accepts a minimum of %d items. Found %d.

ERR11008.description: Parameter '%s' does not allow duplicate values.

ERR11009.description: Value '%s' for parameter '%s' is not allowed. Allowed values are <%s>.

ERR11010.description: Value '%s' for parameter '%s' does not match type '%s' with format '%s'.

ERR11011.description: Value '%s' for parameter '%s' less than allowed min value %f.

ERR11012.description: Value '%s' for parameter '%s' greater than allowed max value %f.

ERR11013.description: No request body is expected for %s on path '%s'.

ERR11014.description: %s on path '%s' requires a request body. None found.

ERR11015.description: Response status %d not defined for path '%s'.

ERR11016.description: %s on path '%s' defines a response schema but no response body found.
